s_title: Faria - A World of Mystery & Danger!
s_synopsis: If you're ready for mind-blowing action... If you're prepared to test yourself against the most fearsome forces of evil... Then it's time to enter the world of FARIA! Slash your way through a relentless onslaught of bloodthirsty monsters! Challenge a cruel and cunning Wizard with your magic and your wits! The King's daughter has been kidnapped by a fiendishly powerful Wizard for his bride. The soldiers and magicians of the King are all powerless to rescue her. And now you have come from a distant land to answer the king's desperate pleas for help! FARIA is action-adventuring fun for the entire family!
